HomePage.title: Agabry
HomePage.description: A simple application that allows you to rent and sell apartments

ServicesPage.title: Services
ServicesPage.description: Bibione offers many services for your vacation – from windsurfing to fishing, from the beach to the spa, even visiting Venice and its tourist attractions.

services.description1: Windsurfing courses for all competition levels.
services.description3: Over 10 km of bike path along the seafront.
services.description4: One of the most beautiful and cleanest beaches in Italy.
services.description6: Regenerate your strength with a visit to the thermal baths.
services.description7: In a short distance you can reach Trieste and the Miramare Castle.
services.description8: Visit the city of Venice and its tourist attractions.
services.description9: After a fun-filled day, take a break and eat at one of our restaurants.

ApartmentsPage.title: Apartments
ApartmentsPage.description: In Bibione you can choose among apartments for sale by various agencies. Here are some we offer.

apartaments.description1: The City Condominium in Bibione Spiaggia offers spacious apartments located just 500m from the sea and the spa, in an area full of shops including supermarkets and bike rentals.
apartaments.description2: In Bibione, 400 meters from Lido dei Pini and 800 meters from Pluto Beach, Condominium Ausonia by the Sea - Gemini offers accommodation with free WiFi and flat-screen TV. Located 200 meters from Bibione Beach, the property features a terrace and free private parking.
apartaments.description3: Condominium Gir in Bibione offers spacious apartments just 100m from the sea and the Lido dei Pini, in an area with many shops including supermarkets and bike rentals.
apartaments.description4: Condominium Cormoran is located in the Bibione Lido del Sole area, 300 meters from Lido del Sole, 1 km from Bibione Pineda Beach, and 1 km from Bibione Beach.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.description: Get in touch for more information about our offers
